datafield.subfield: New Mexican Print. and Pub. Co.
Cf. Grove, Pearce S. /New Mexico newspapers.

Microfilm published by BMI Imaging Systems. Dec. 21, 1881 filmed with scattered issues of: Agricultor moderno, of: Northwest New Mexican, of: Deming headlight (Deming, N.M. : 1881), of: Deming tribune and Lake Valley herald, of: Eddy argus, of: Eddy County citizen, of: Estancia news, of: Nuevas de la Estancia, of: Sierra County advocate, of: Kingston weekly shaft, of an undated collection of advertisements (19th century)--from Las Vegas, N.M., entitled: Boletin de anuncios, of: Cachiporra, of: Campaign bulletin (Las Vegas, N.M.), of: Chronicle (Las Vegas, N.M.), of: Daily examiner (Las Vegas, N.M.), of: Hispano-Americano (Las Vegas, N.M.), of: Las Vegas daily gazette, of: Las Vegas daily optic, of: Las Vegas record, of: Las Vegas weekly optic, of: New Mexico herald, of: Sol de mayo (Las Vegas, N.M. : 1891), of Voz del pueblo (Santa Fe, N.M. : 1889), of: Western liberal (Lordsburg, N.M.), of: Magdalena Mountain mail (Magdalena, N.M. : 1888), of: Estrella (Maldonado, N.M.), of: Crónica de Mora, of: Gaceta de Mora, of: Mora echo, of: Mosquito (Mora, N.M.), of: Amigo del pueblo (Raton, N.M.), of: Raton range (Raton, N.M. : 1887), of: Raton reporter (Raton, N.M. : 1890), of: Rincon weekly, of: Roswell record, of: Comercio (San Acacia, N.M.), of: Libertad (San Marcial, N.M.), of: San Marcial bee, of: San Marcial reporter, of: Boletin popular (Santa Fe, N.M.), of: Capital (Santa Fe, N.M.), of: Gato (Santa Fe, N.M.), of: Gauntlet (Santa Fe, N.M.), of: Guia de Santa Fe, of: Nuevo Méxicano (Santa Fe, N.M. : 1890), of: Registro de Nuevo México, of: Santa Fe daily New Mexican (Santa Fe, N.M. : 1881), and of: Santa Fe daily New Mexican (Santa Fe, N.M. : 1885).
